title:
Spontaneous breaking of a global symmetry in the Minimum Supersymmetric
  $SU(3)_{C}\otimes SU(3)_{L}\otimes U(1)_{N}$ Model
abstract:
We will study in details the full scalar potential of the Minimal
Supersymmetric $SU(3)_{C}\times SU(3)_{L}\times U(1)_{N}$ Model when all the
scalars fields belong to sextet and anti-sextet representation obtain VEV. We
will present numerical predictions for neutral scalars of this model, we will
show that the mass of the light scalar of CP par is $125.5$ GeV while the light
pseudoscalar have mass bigger than $150$ GeV.
